Title: Object: La huida á Egipto
Series: Colección lithographica de cuadros del rey de España el señor Fernando VII
Series: Colección litografica de cuadros del Rey de España
Description: Flight into Egypt, after Alessandro Turchi, with the angel standing on the right and pointnig to the left, St Joseph looking at him, and the Virgin and Child on a mule guided by another angel. c.1826/32 Lithograph, on chine collé
Producer name: Print made by: José de Madrazo (director)
Curator's comments: Publishe din the third volume of 'Colección lithographica de cuadros del Rey de España...', see 1869,0410.1367 for comment. After a painting which is now in the Prado, Madrid.
Bibliographic references: Páez 1981-85 / Repertorio de Grabados Españoles en la Biblioteca Nacional (1589.1(6))
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
